Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.config  
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.annotated
    Classes for dealing with annotated fields (having multiple annotations for each token).
    nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config  
    nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.preprocess  
    nl.inl.blacklab.mocks  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.indexmetadata  
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config used by nl.inl.blacklab.config 
    Class and Description
    YamlJsonReader
    Base class for a class that interprets a JSON structure.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config used by nl.inl.blacklab.index 
    Class and Description
    ConfigInputFormat
    Configuration for an input format (either contents, or metadata, or a mix of both).
    DocIndexerConfig
    A DocIndexer configured using a ConfigInputFormat structure.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config used by nl.inl.blacklab.index.annotated 
    Class and Description
    ConfigAnnotation
    Configuration for a single annotation (formerly "property") of an annotated field (formerly "complex field").
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config used by nl.inl.blacklab.indexers.config 
    Class and Description
    ConfigAnnotatedField
    Configuration for annotated (formerly "complex") fields in our XML
    ConfigAnnotation
    Configuration for a single annotation (formerly "property") of an annotated field (formerly "complex field").
    ConfigAnnotationGroup
    Configuration for a group of annotations.
    ConfigAnnotationGroups
    Configuration for how to group annotations for an annotated field.
    ConfigCorpus
    Settings that will be used to write the indexmetadata file for any corpus we create from this format.
    ConfigInlineTag
    Configuration for an XML element occurring in an annotated field.
    ConfigInputFormat
    Configuration for an input format (either contents, or metadata, or a mix of both).
    ConfigInputFormat.FileType
    Basic file types we support
    ConfigInputFormat.FileTypeOption
    file type options for a FileType
    ConfigLinkedDocument
    Configuration for a linked document.
    ConfigLinkedDocument.MissingLinkPathAction 
    ConfigLinkValue
    Configuration for linked document link values.
    ConfigMetadataBlock
    Configuration for a block of metadata fields.
    ConfigMetadataField
    Configuration for metadata field(s).
    ConfigMetadataFieldGroup
    Configuration for a group of metadata fields.
    ConfigProcessStep
    Configuration for a processing step on a value.
    ConfigStandoffAnnotations
    Configuration for a block of standoff annotations (annotations that don't reside under the word tag but elsewhere in the document).
    ConfigWithAnnotations 
    DocIndexerBase 
    DocIndexerConfig
    A DocIndexer configured using a ConfigInputFormat structure.
    InputFormatReader.BaseFormatFinder 
    TextDirection
    Text direction: left-to-right or right-to-left (and possible future values?)
    YamlJsonReader
    Base class for a class that interprets a JSON structure.
